title: Man Vampire
description: A male vampire shown wearing a dark cape, and with pointed fangs.
apple_vendor_description: The man vampire emoji on Apple devices cuts a dramatic figure, cloaked in dark, rich fabrics that catch the light with Apple‚Äôs signature glossy sheen and deep 3D shading. His expression is often a sly smirk or a mysterious gaze, with sharp, stylized features characteristic of Apple's character designs, all softened by rounded edges. This emoji is perfect for expressing a playful or dramatic embrace of the supernatural, gothic themes, or even a hint of mischief, rendered with Apple's distinctive, high-quality aesthetic.
